definition: general anesthetic/abbr. for 全身麻醉
generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: Methods Patients were subjected to bronchoscope to be offered high frequency jet ventilation after general anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 方法全麻后经支气管镜的供氧管行高频喷射通气供氧。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of respiratory inhibition by gesuline after general anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察佳苏仑拮抗全麻后呼吸抑制的效果。

sentences.english: Intravenous anesthesia and inhalation anesthesia are general anesthesia method.
sentences.chinese: 静脉麻醉和吸入麻醉都是全麻的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the practicability and safety of sevoflurane in general anesthesia inducing.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨七氟醚在全麻诱导中的实用性与安全性。

sentences.english: Effect of atracurium and succinylcholine on intraocular pressure in general anaesthesia was observed.
sentences.chinese: 观察全麻时阿屈可林和琥珀胆碱对眼内压的影响。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the pharmacokinetics of remifentanil in adult patients undergoing general anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价全麻下成年病人瑞芬太尼的药代动力学。

sentences.english: Conventional breast enhancement surgery adopts complete hemp, from axillary next cut.
sentences.chinese: 传统的丰胸手术采取全麻，从腋窝下切口。

sentences.english: General anaesthesia for the cocaine abusing patient. Is it safe?
sentences.chinese: 给予可卡因成瘾的患者实施全麻安全吗？
